data.text: Cabin crew and ground staff are trained to look for symptoms of Ebola, and will notify the airport doctor and quarantine officer if needed
All inbound international flights will be sprayed with WHO approved disinfectant, and the aircraft will be deep cleaned upon landing
Effective 21 August, We are taking preventive measures to protect passengers from Ebola. The safety of all pax and crew is our top priority

@Joyce_PK From Singapore, you can book flights to any destination within Nok Air's domestic network :)
@FHavg The waiting time will depend on the connecting destination, and we're working to make the connecting times more convenient :)
Pax can buy a single journey ticket and connect with our domestic network. I.E. Singapore - Chiang Rai, or Sydney to Mae Sot
Good news! More connectivity convenience as we launch an interline service with @InsideScoot starting September 1st
